title: "Delta"-Style Pickle and Mustard Dipping Sauce Recipe
full_text:
"Delta"-Style Pickle and Mustard Dipping Sauce Recipe
Close

Prep
5 mins

5 mins
Serves
6
to 8 servings
Makes
1 cup
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
2/3
cup
mayonnaise
1/4
cup
spicy brown mustard
2
tablespoons
dill pickle relish
1
teaspoon
Worcestershire sauce
1
teaspoon
freshly
ground black pepper
1/2
teaspoon
paprika
1
medium
clove garlic
grated on a microplane grater (about
1
teaspoon
)
Directions
Whisk all ingredients together in a medium bowl. Serve with fried chicken.
